name: Ayush Gairola
title: Full Stack Web Developer
summary: Self-taught full-stack developer with hands-on experience in building production-grade applications using modern web technologies. Led backend development at a US-based startup and shipped multiple platforms from scratch. Passionate about building scalable systems, real-time features, and impactful user experiences.
highlights: Led backend for a US-based startup, improving performance by 30%
Built 4+ real-world full-stack apps with modern tech
Reduced query load and response times by up to 40%

experience.title: Lead Backend Developer
achievements: Promoted from intern to lead developer within 2 months
Spearheaded key backend systems using Node.js, PostgreSQL, and microservices
Enhanced application performance and scalability by 30%

experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
achievements: Worked on various UI components using React and Tailwind
Improved user experience, increasing usage time by 20%

projects.name: Surge – Blog & Social Networking Platform
